name: Wildlife: Horse Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Welcome to your own horse land full of beautiful wild horses! Play Wildlife: Horse Survival Simulator 3D and be an amazing horse living at wilderness and trying to create it’s own family. Your goal is to explore the forest as a wild horse, meet and mate with other horses, find food for them and beware wild predators walking around! Be a wild hoss – free and beautiful and try to stay alive at this cruel world! Meet other animals, pets and aggressive predators to make friends with them or struggle against!

Wildlife: Horse Survival Simulator 3D it’s your chance to raise up from a little foal to the dobbin, meet and mate with other horses, fight against predators and just have fun! Choose gender, name, and color and have fun playing Horse Life Survival Simulator – great game for those who loves animal simulators! Eat, drink, run to find another horse to make a herd, and to journey together! Meet with other animals - goats and rabbits - to protect your food and territories or to befriend it and make the part of your herd. There is no any ranch and someone who will care about you, so fight against aggressive animals to protect your herd!

Remember, each gelding has health, energy, water and food indicators - if one of it drops – there is no chance to stay alive! Upgrade horse’s skills to give birth to little foal and start your own horse family or herd! Make your horse becomes unique customizing it!

Wildlife: Horse Survival Simulator 3D features:

- Ultimate wild horse simulator full of entertaining missions
- Great chance to start your own horse family, herd or breed
- Beautiful and realistic 3D world to explore
- Opportunity to communicate with or struggle against other wild animals
- Various upgrades for your horse – level up it every time you get points

Do you like pony, horse and other animal simulators? This ultimate horse simulator would give you an opportunity to live the whole life of single horse – from the small weak and helpless foal through mature mare or stallion to the ghost of the old horse!
